parameters.name: CertificateType
parameters.description: The type of the certificate. Valid values: **Ca** and **Server**.

parameters.name: ListenerId
parameters.description: The listener ID. You must specify the ID of an HTTPS listener or a QUIC listener.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return in each call. Valid values: **1 to 100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of **NextToken**.
